mapper.insert: insert into order_info(channel_id, channel_name, pay_passageway_name, mch_id, pay_type, request_time, finish_time, user_info, product, money, order_id, platform_id, state) values (#{oi.channelId},#{oi.channelName},#{oi.payPassagewayName},#{oi.mchId},#{oi.payType}, #{oi.requestTime},#{oi.finishTime},#{oi.userInfo},#{oi.product},#{oi.money},#{oi.orderId},#{oi.platformId},#{oi.state})
mapper.select: select * from order_info order by request_time desc limit #{offset},#{limit}
